data.name: Adult VR Game Room
data.detailed_description:
Adult VR Game Room is a game in which you breed unique ACTORS (Artificial Cell Transmutable Organic Robots). Interact with them, become them, meet other players and their creations in an online Multiplayer.

You are in charge of a research laboratory called "Griffin's Nest". You will be managing the lab machinery and resources, conducting research, and breeding ACTORS.
Create new and unique ACTORS by fusing any two ACTORS together. Combine different species, races, body types, and traits. Apply researched modifiers and mutators during the breeding process to create a one of a kind, exquisite ACTOR. The possibilities are virtually endless. The choice is yours.

Drop your ACTORS into different customizable environments. Add furniture, props, toys, lights and other items to set up the environment the way you want it. Interact with your ACTORS, control them, pose them, animate them, possess and become them. Do as you please.

Meet other breeders and their creations in an online Multiplayer. Share your research results and conduct cooperative experiments.

What will you create ?

Features

  • Breeding System - Combine different species, races, body types, and traits to create a unique, one of a kind ACTOR.
  • Interaction System - Pose, animate, control and possess your ACTORS.
  • Realistic Physics - Physics based gameplay that looks and feels real.
  • Customizable environments - Add furniture, props, toys, lights and other items to any environment to make it your own.
  • Online Multiplayer - Play with your friends, long distance partners, or connect with new and exciting people online.
  • Voice Chat - Real-time voice chat for immersive and interactive gameplay.
  • Public & Private - Both public and private lobbies are available for everyone.

data.short_description: Adult VR Game Room is a game in which you manage a research laboratory equipment and resources. Breed unique ACTORS (Artificial Cell Transmutable Organic Robots). Interact with them, control them, become them. Meet other players and their creations in an online Multiplayer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 series / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 series / AMD Ryzen 7 or greater
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1080 ti / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages. Nudity, Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
